description: Unroll the REI Co-op large Shower Roll and hang it from a hook (or tree branch) when you get to your destination. It packs small and holds plenty of toiletries in 3 different types of pockets.
name: Shower Roll - Large

specs.value: Recycled nylon shell; recycled polyester lining
Open: 19.3 x 9.8 x 1.9inches; rolled: 10.75 x 7.75 x 4 inches
Contains materials that meet the bluesign® criteria
From a Climate Neutral Certified brand
